state.dldescription: Indicates the time/period in the animal's life which the data represents: original (birth), current (moved), historic

validFrom.dldescription: Start date of the animal at the location

validThrough.dldescription: End date of the animal at the location

herdIdentifiers.dldescription: Identifiers for the herd of the animal, according to the industry body that governs the herd codes for the species or breed.
